entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is introduced as a character who has been mopping his eyes under his glasses with a corner of his traveling cloak. He mentions that he had to find a way out and it's not so easy at the Ministry.

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is mentioned as someone Percy made contact with who tipped him off about Hogwarts making a fight for it.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is introduced as Percy's brother and is quoted in the conversation.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as Percy's sister-in-law and is shaking hands with him.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as one of the people hurrying off toward the staircase with George.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the people hurrying off toward the staircase with George.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as someone who has been attempting to sneak upstairs too.

entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly is mentioned as someone who barks at Ginny.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is introduced as someone who suggests that Ginny stay here.

relationships.description: Percy made contact with Aberforth, who tipped him off about Hogwarts making a fight for it.
